categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic divisions

nodes.text: Light Brigade Division was a brigade of starfighter corps in the Grand Army of the Republic during the last year of the Clone Wars. The brigade included HOB-147 who flew a V-19 Torrent starfighter.
Shortly before the execution of Order 66, Light Brigade engaged Confederate forces in a space battle. During the battle HOB-147's starfighter was badly damaged.
